sentences.english: The nutrition composition in the seed kernel of white pitaya was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對火龍果種仁的營養成分進行了分析。

sentences.english: Seeds, such as sunflower or pumpkin, are an option.
sentences.chinese: 種仁，如葵花籽或南瓜籽，是不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: Hawthorn has apomixes characteristic with a high rate of non-seed fruit.
sentences.chinese: 山楂能夠單性結實，無種仁果率較高。

sentences.english: Black kernels are those that are darker than dark amber on a standard color chart .
sentences.chinese: 黑仁指的是在標準色譜上顏色深於暗琥珀色的種仁。
